mechanics.outcome: Creates a ward protecting up to 2,500 sq ft of floor space (20 ft tall), shaped as desired, possibly across multiple stories. Caster must walk into each contiguous area during casting.
Specified individuals are unaffected by chosen effects of Guards and Wards.
Creature speaking the password aloud becomes immune to chosen effects of Guards and Wards.

mechanics.condition: Corridor is within the warded area
mechanics.outcome: Corridor becomes heavily obscured by fog.

mechanics.trigger: Creature (not caster) reaches intersection or branching passage in warded corridor
mechanics.condition: Creature is not the caster AND passage is within the warded area
mechanics.outcome: There is a 50% chance the creature believes it is going in the opposite direction from the one it chooses.

mechanics.trigger: All doors within the warded area
mechanics.condition: Door is within the warded area
mechanics.outcome: Door is magically locked, as if sealed by an arcane lock spell.

mechanics.trigger: Caster designates up to ten doors
mechanics.condition: Door is within the warded area AND chosen by caster
mechanics.outcome: Chosen door appears as a plain section of wall (equivalent to Minor Illusion's illusory object function).

mechanics.trigger: All stairs within the warded area
mechanics.condition: Stairs are within the warded area
mechanics.outcome: Stairs are filled with webs from top to bottom (as per web spell). These webs regrow in 10 minutes if burned or torn away while Guards and Wards lasts.

mechanics.condition: Four corridors are within the warded area
mechanics.outcome: Dancing Lights are placed in four corridors, following a simple designated program.

mechanics.condition: Caster designates two locations within the warded area
mechanics.outcome: Magic Mouth is placed in two designated locations.

mechanics.condition: Caster designates two locations within the warded area
mechanics.outcome: Stinking Cloud vapors appear in two designated locations. Vapors return within 10 minutes if dispersed by wind.

mechanics.condition: Caster designates one corridor or room within the warded area
mechanics.outcome: A constant Gust of Wind effect is placed in one designated corridor or room.

mechanics.condition: Caster designates one 5-foot square area within the warded area
mechanics.outcome: Any creature entering or passing through the designated area receives a mental suggestion.

mechanics.trigger: Magic detection check on warded area
mechanics.outcome: The entire warded area radiates magic.

mechanics.trigger: Dispel Magic cast on an effect of Guards and Wards
mechanics.condition: Dispel Magic is successful on a specific effect
mechanics.outcome: Only that specific effect is removed; the entire spell is not dispelled.

mechanics.trigger: Caster casts Guards and Wards daily for one year
mechanics.condition: Spell cast daily in the same structure for one year
mechanics.outcome: The structure becomes permanently guarded and warded.

description_text: You create a ward that protects up to 2,500 square feet of floor space (an area 50 feet square, or one hundred 5-foot squares or twenty-five 10-foot squares). The warded area can be up to 20 feet tall, and shaped as you desire. You can ward several stories of a stronghold by dividing the area among them, as long as you can walk into each contiguous area while you are casting the spell.When you cast this spell, you can specify individuals that are unaffected by any or all of the effects that you choose. You can also specify a password that, when spoken aloud, makes the speaker immune to these effects.Guards and wards creates the following effects within the warded area.***Corridors.*** Fog fills all the warded corridors, making them heavily obscured. In addition, at each intersection or branching passage offering a choice of direction, there is a 50 percent chance that a creature other than you will believe it is going in the opposite direction from the one it chooses.***Doors.*** All doors in the warded area are magically locked, as if sealed by an arcane lock spell. In addition, you can cover up to ten doors with an illusion (equivalent to the illusory object function of the minor illusion spell) to make them appear as plain sections of wall.***Stairs.*** Webs fill all stairs in the warded area from top to bottom, as the web spell. These strands regrow in 10 minutes if they are burned or torn away while guards and wards lasts.***Other Spell Effect.*** You can place your choice of one of the following magical effects within the warded area of the stronghold.- Place dancing lights in four corridors. You can designate a simple program that the lights repeat as long as guards and wards lasts.- Place magic mouth in two locations.- Place stinking cloud in two locations. The vapors appear in the places you designate; they return within 10 minutes if dispersed by wind while guards and wards lasts.- Place a constant gust of wind in one corridor or room.- Place a suggestion in one location. You select an area of up to 5 feet square, and any creature that enters or passes through the area receives the suggestion mentally.The whole warded area radiates magic. A dispel magic cast on a specific effect, if successful, removes only that effect.You can create a permanently guarded and warded structure by casting this spell there every day for one year.
